name: 🟢 Help
description: Get help from fellow Obsidian users.

name: 🔴 Bug Reports
description: Report bugs so that we can squash them. Please try searching for duplicates before posting.

name: 🟢 Feature Requests
description: Suggest features to be added to core Obsidian. For third party plugin ideas, post under “Plugins ideas”. Please try searching for duplicates before posting.

name: 🔵 Share & Showcase
description: Showcase your custom CSS, workflows, and nifty hacks.

name: 🟣 Plugin Ideas
description: Share plugin ideas and talk about what interfaces are needed.

name: 🟢 Developers & API
description: Talk about the upcoming plugin interface and technical stuff while working with Obsidian. For plugin ideas, please post under “Plugin ideas”.

name: 🔴 Mobile
description: Let us know the bugs and requests you have with the mobile app.

name: 🔵 Meta
description: Meta topics about Obsidian or the forum.

name: 🟢 FAQ
description: Read answers to FAQs here. To suggest a topic, please post under “Obsidian”.

name: ⚪️ Bug Graveyard
description: Rest in peace, Obsidian bugs, please do not come back and haunt us. (Regression bugs suck!)

name: ⚪️ Resolved Help
description: If you still need help with something, comment on it and @moderators so we can move it back to “Help” for you.
